name: part_006
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: The members discuss the previous challenge, Kronii's score, and choose the next singer.
Ouro Kronii sings 'Delusion Tax' (Mousou Zei) while enduring the foot massage mat.
The members react to Kronii's performance and score. Bae prepares for her turn.
Hakos Baelz sings 'Ft.' (Fairy Tail OP3) while enduring the foot massage mat.

subtitles.original: Good! Right! Good!
subtitles.english: Good! Right! Good!

subtitles.original: Oh, there you go!
subtitles.english: Oh, there you go!

subtitles.original: How's your blood flow? Do you feel refreshed?
subtitles.english: How's your blood flow? Do you feel refreshed?

subtitles.original: You look great!
subtitles.english: You look great!

subtitles.original: Shall we see the score?
subtitles.english: Shall we see the score?

subtitles.english: This is what she got! Dun-dun!

subtitles.original: I've never gotten a score that low before!
subtitles.english: I've never gotten a score that low before!

subtitles.original: 70.161. That's so good!
subtitles.english: 70.161. That's so good!

subtitles.original: That's good! What are you talking about?
subtitles.english: That's good! What are you talking about?

subtitles.original: You know 70... That's a B minus.
subtitles.english: You know 70... That's a B minus.

subtitles.english: B minus? That's pretty good!

subtitles.original: Isn't it a B minus? That's a C minus.
subtitles.english: Isn't it a B minus? That's a C minus.

subtitles.original: No, it's a B minus.
subtitles.english: No, it's a B minus.

subtitles.original: Alrighty then. Who wants to go next?
subtitles.english: Alrighty then. Who wants to go next?

subtitles.original: Senpai! Senpai!
subtitles.english: Senpai! Senpai!

subtitles.original: We're from the same Gen!
subtitles.english: We're from the same Gen!

subtitles.original: She's Senpai by two hours.
subtitles.english: She's Senpai by two hours.

subtitles.original: Was it two hours?
subtitles.english: Was it two hours?

subtitles.original: I've never heard that from you before.
subtitles.english: I've never heard that from you before.

subtitles.original: I'll go! You go!
subtitles.english: I'll go! You go!

subtitles.original: You're gonna have so much fun!
subtitles.english: You're gonna have so much fun!

subtitles.original: Okay, so Kronii, what song are you gonna sing for us?
subtitles.english: Okay, so Kronii, what song are you gonna sing for us?

subtitles.original: I'm going to be singing Mousou Zei!
subtitles.english: I'm going to be singing Mousou Zei!

subtitles.original: Oh! Sakebimashou Mousou Zei!
subtitles.english: Oh! Let's shout, Mousou Zei!

subtitles.original: I only know old songs. Yay!
subtitles.english: I only know old songs. Yay!

subtitles.original: That's great! I know that song!
subtitles.english: That's great! I know that song!

subtitles.original: Please start the music! Music Start!
subtitles.english: Please start the music! Music Start!

subtitles.original: You're gonna be fine!
subtitles.english: You're gonna be fine!

subtitles.original: あの子もいいな　あの子もいいな
subtitles.english: That girl is nice, that girl is nice too.

subtitles.original: 頭の中で　イイコトしてる
subtitles.english: Doing 'good things' inside their head.

subtitles.original: あなたはそれで満足ですか？
subtitles.english: Are you satisfied with that?

subtitles.original: 叶えたいとは思いませんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you want to make it come true?

subtitles.original: あなたはそれで満足ですか？
subtitles.english: Are you satisfied with that?

subtitles.original: 叶えたいとは思いませんか？ ah!
subtitles.english: Don't you want to make it come true? Ah!

subtitles.original: You're on a good spot right now.
subtitles.english: You're on a good spot right now.

subtitles.original: あの子でいいや　あの子でいいや
subtitles.english: That girl will do, that girl will do.

subtitles.original: 妥協 大好き　飲む針千本
subtitles.english: Love to compromise, swallow a thousand needles.

subtitles.original: あなたはそれで満足ですか？
subtitles.english: Are you satisfied with that?

subtitles.original: 叶えたいとは思いませんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you want to make it come true?

subtitles.original: あなたはそれで満足ですか？
subtitles.english: Are you satisfied with that?

subtitles.original: 叶えたいとは思いませんか？
subtitles.english: Don't you want to make it come true?

subtitles.original: 納めましょう妄想税
subtitles.english: Let's pay the Delusion Tax.

subtitles.original: 皆様の暮らしを豊かにするために
subtitles.english: To enrich everyone's lives.

subtitles.original: She's doing it!
subtitles.english: She's doing it!

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　たい　たいを現実に
subtitles.english: Turn 'want to make it come true' into reality.

subtitles.original: 今、未来　らい　らいを買い戻せ
subtitles.english: Buy back the future now.

subtitles.original: アレしたい　したい病も
subtitles.english: Even the 'want to do that' disease...

subtitles.original: 欲しがりも
subtitles.english: ...and the greed.

subtitles.original: さあ、痛い　だいたい　のその向こうへ
subtitles.english: Now, let's go beyond the pain.

subtitles.original: そう、汚い妄想は
subtitles.english: Yes, those dirty delusions...

subtitles.original: 汚いお金で解決させましょう
subtitles.english: ...let's resolve them with dirty money.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah! Ah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah! Ah!

subtitles.original: You did amazing!
subtitles.english: You did amazing!

subtitles.original: I feel like that brought out like a roughness.
subtitles.english: I feel like that brought out like a roughness.

subtitles.original: How could I actually sing on that?
subtitles.english: How could I actually sing on that?

subtitles.original: Oh wow, blood circulation.
subtitles.english: Oh wow, blood circulation.

subtitles.original: That's a lot of blood circulation. Wow.
subtitles.english: That's a lot of blood circulation. Wow.

subtitles.original: Alright, the score is in. Let's see what Kronii got.
subtitles.english: Alright, the score is in. Let's see what Kronii got.

subtitles.original: It's still the first half, I can still make it!
subtitles.english: It's still the first half, I can still make it!

subtitles.original: Mada zenhan!
subtitles.english: It's still the first half!

subtitles.original: Oh god, my turn!
subtitles.english: Oh god, my turn!

subtitles.original: I'm excited. I've been wanting to sing this song for so long.
subtitles.english: I'm excited. I've been wanting to sing this song for so long.

subtitles.original: Okay, what song is it?
subtitles.english: Okay, what song is it?

subtitles.original: Fairy Tail! Yakusoku no Hi!
subtitles.english: Fairy Tail! The Day of Promise!

subtitles.original: Finally! I finally found an instrumental track.
subtitles.english: Finally! I finally found an instrumental track.

subtitles.original: Your childhood, I'm assuming?
subtitles.english: Your childhood, I'm assuming?

subtitles.original: Not really. Okay.
subtitles.english: Not really. Okay.

subtitles.original: Please hop onto the foot reflexology mat.
subtitles.english: Please hop onto the foot reflexology mat.

subtitles.original: You ready? Yeah.
subtitles.english: You ready? Yeah.

subtitles.original: Okay, now please start singing. Music Start!
subtitles.english: Okay, now please start singing. Music Start!

subtitles.original: Fairy Tail!
subtitles.english: Fairy Tail!

subtitles.original: この手で　掴んだ
subtitles.english: The light I grasped with this hand...

subtitles.original: 光は
Ah! Ah! You're walking! You're walking!
subtitles.english: Ah! Ah! You're walking! You're walking!

subtitles.original: You're great! Yeah, let's go!
subtitles.english: You're great! Yeah, let's go!

subtitles.original: 夢に描いた理想郷
subtitles.english: The utopia I painted in my dreams.

subtitles.original: 夢のまま終わらせない
subtitles.english: I won't let it end as just a dream.

subtitles.original: いつか会える　未来の僕に伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell the future me that I'll meet someday.

subtitles.original: 時に未来は残酷で
subtitles.english: Sometimes the future is cruel.

subtitles.original: 鏡のように割れるけど
subtitles.english: And breaks like a mirror.

subtitles.original: 欠片を失くさないよう
subtitles.english: So I don't lose the pieces...

subtitles.original: 見つけ出せばいい
subtitles.english: ...I just have to find them.

subtitles.original: 凍える闇が
subtitles.english: Even if the freezing darkness...

subtitles.original: 僕たちの行く手塞いでも
subtitles.english: ...blocks our path.

subtitles.original: きっと忘れない希望
subtitles.english: The hope I'll surely never forget.

subtitles.original: この手で　掴んだ光は
subtitles.english: The light I grasped with this hand...

subtitles.original: 絆の力　溢れているから
subtitles.english: ...is overflowing with the power of our bonds.
